scripts.android: npm run build --prefix ../networking && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && react-native run-android
scripts.ios: npm run build --prefix ../networking && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 14'
scripts.apk: npm run build --prefix ../networking && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.fastlane: npm run build --prefix ../networking && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && cd ios && fastlane ios beta
scripts.reload: adb shell input keyevent 82 && adb shell input keyevent 66 && adb shell input keyevent 66
scripts.debug: adb shell input keyevent 82 && adb shell input keyevent 61 && adb shell input keyevent 66 && adb shell input keyevent 66
scripts.start: npm run build --prefix ../networking && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && react-native start
